üöÄ Quick Start

  1. Click "Open Application" above to start using the metronome
  2. Grant microphone permissions when prompted
  3. Select your desired time signature and tempo
  4. Click "Start with Count-In" to begin
  5. Try voice commands like "tempo 120" or "start"
Note: For best results, use Chrome or Safari browsers. Voice commands and microphone features require modern browser support.
